name: Blindness_Deafness
description: You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject blinded or deafened, as you choose.

name: Scare
description: This spell functions like cause fear, except that it causes all targeted creatures of less than 6 HD to become frightened. Material Component: A bit of bone from an undead skeleton, zombie, ghoul, ghast, or mummy.
target: One living creature per three levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
duration: 1 round/level or 1 round; see text for cause fear
